title: Le Chiffre

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During the day, select 3 other players to play Texas Hold 'em with.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For all related purposes, the host is the dealer.
- Only other players' roles, and not their names, will be shown, and can anonymously communicate.
- The game will go for 3 rounds, the player with the least amount of cash, aside from you, will be dealt a powerful attack.
Scheme:**You know your place:**
The number of votes to hang someone will permanently be raised by 2. To accomodate for this, all SPECTRE players will permanently gain an anonymous extra vote
